pageRank

Class PageRankMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • pageRank.PageRankMatrix

  • public class PageRankMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a simplified matrix that represents a sparse matrix used to calculate page rank
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kaiyuan Shi
